sub_title: Independent Expert I International law and relations I Cooperation, negotiation, mutual legal assistance I Legal Direction I International investigations I External relations, public policy and communication strategies
summary:
International lawyer and diplomat, with a demonstrated experience in international cooperation, high level and sensitive negotiations and public communications and external relations strategies.

Strong professional background in advising international organisations, governmental authorities and NGOs on legal and political issues, external and public relations, judicial action and strategies and multilateral cooperation. 

Hold an LLM in European Law from the College of Europe and graduated from Sciences Po Paris in International and European affairs and from the Lyon III law faculty in international law.
